com.tuxnet.utils

Class H2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tuxnet.utils.H2

  • public class H2
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for interaction with H2 database.

    References:
    1) https://www.tutorialspoint.com/h2_database/h2_database_jdbc_connection.htm

          java.lang.String userName,

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(boolean verbose)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Connect to H2 database
        Parameters:
        verbose - if true - gives output to stdout
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - ClassNotFoundException: when driver declared in JDBC_DRIVER doesn't exist
        SQLException: when connection to H2 database failed

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(boolean verbose)

      • select

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> select(java.lang.String sqlStatement,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> columns,
                                                               boolean verbose)
                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Run SELECT SQL statement
        Parameters:
        sqlStatement - SQL statement which will be sent to the database
        columns - retrieved columns from SQL query response
        verbose - if true - gives sqlStatement to stdout
        Returns:
        the SQL query response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - SQLException
